creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
markings: Marks on cover, URC, in pencil: [339 / no. 6B]; inside front cover, in pencil, URC: [339 / 6B]; pencil mark back page ULC: [MS date / 1594]; Label inside front cover LRC, Ex Libris of John Hadmar Sticht; five seals on front page
medium: Woodblock printed book, ink and color on paper
text: First edition from 1594; his is a later edition. 23 page book with illustrations by the monk Tokusen.
title: Sutra on the Ten Kings of Hell
